tumor_size_max_dimension_evidence: The maximum dimension of the tumor is stated in the pathology report as 4.0 cm.
pT_evidence: The pT category is stated in the comment section of the pathology report as T2NO, indicating a tumor size greater than 3 cm but not more than 5 cm.
pN_evidence: The pN category is stated in the comment section of the pathology report as T2NO, indicating no regional lymph node metastasis.
tumor_stage_evidence: Based on the estimated pT category (T2) and pN category (N0), the tumor stage is estimated to be Stage IB according to AJCC7 criteria.
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: The histologic diagnosis is stated in the pathology report as invasive moderately-differentiated squamous cell carcinoma.
comment: The pathology report indicates a complete resection of a T2NO squamous cell carcinoma with no evidence of lymph node metastasis. The tumor size is 4.0 cm, and the histologic diagnosis is invasive moderately-differentiated squamous cell carcinoma.
